description.value: HL7-defined code system of concepts specifying whether or not the pharmaceutical substance is part of the local formulary. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the RXE segment.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0478 (Formulary Status)

copyright.value: This material derives from the HL7 Terminology (THO). THO is copyright Â©1989+ Health Level Seven International and is made available under the CC0 designation. For more licensing information see: https://terminology.hl7.org/license.html

description.value: A code that indicates the status of the concept
Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

display.value: Pharmaceutical substance is in the formulary

definition.value: Pharmaceutical substance is in the formulary

display.value: Pharmaceutical substance is NOT in the formulary

definition.value: Pharmaceutical substance is NOT in the formulary

display.value: Pharmaceutical substance is in the formulary, but restrictions apply

definition.value: Pharmaceutical substance is in the formulary, but restrictions apply

display.value: Pharmaceutical substance is in the formulary, but guidelines apply

definition.value: Pharmaceutical substance is in the formulary, but guidelines apply
